summary: An ambitious shoe salesman unknowingly meets his boss' daughter and tells her he is a leather tycoon, then has to try to hide his true circumstances.
cast: Harold Lloyd|Barbara Kent|Robert McWade|Lillian Leighton|Henry Hall|Noah Young|Alec B. Francis|Arthur Housman|Willie Best|Nick Copeland|James Finlayson|Sydney Jarvis|Buster Phelps|Paul Gerard Smith|Leo Willis
title: Â¡Ay que me caigo!
